name: GDevelop3DPhysics
shortDescription: Adds stuff for built-in 3D in GDevelop!
description: This is a beta Extension and it may have bugs, Feel free to report an issue on the Github.

eventsFunctions.description: Detects if the preferred object is in the 3d box.
eventsFunctions.name: CollisionDetecton

eventsFunctions.description: This will make falling slower, and jumping higher.
eventsFunctions.name: GravityScale

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Put the Physics3D(3D box), or Physics3D(3D Model) Behavior on the Player Object.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: Physics3DBox

eventsFunctions.description: Return the value of the Obstacles Step Height.
eventsFunctions.name: StepHeight

eventsFunctions.description: Change the Value of the Step Height.
eventsFunctions.name: SetStepHeight

propertyDescriptors.label: How high the player will step on this obstacle.
propertyDescriptors.description: Depending on value, it will pick the player up and put it on the obstacle.
propertyDescriptors.name: StepHeight

eventsFunctions.description: Make the preferred Object to jump in a 3D Envirement.
eventsFunctions.name: Jump_3D

eventsFunctions.description: Stop the 3D jumping of the preferred object.
eventsFunctions.name: Stop3DJump

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the preferred Object is Jumping.
eventsFunctions.name: Is3DJumping

eventsFunctions.description: Returns the falling speed of the preferred object.
eventsFunctions.name: JumpHeight

eventsFunctions.description: Returns the falling speed of the preferred object.
eventsFunctions.name: JumpSpeed

eventsFunctions.description: Returns the falling speed of the preferred object.
eventsFunctions.name: FallSpeed

eventsFunctions.description: Make the preferred Object fall in a 3D Envirement.
eventsFunctions.name: Fall_3D
eventsFunctions.sentence: Make _PARAM0_ 3D 3D fall with _PARAM2_ as an obstacle

eventsFunctions.description: Separate Objects in a 2D Envirement.
eventsFunctions.name: Block2DEntry

eventsFunctions.description: Separate Objects in a 3D Envirement.
eventsFunctions.name: Block3DTopEntry

eventsFunctions.description: Separate Objects in a 3D Envirement.
eventsFunctions.name: Block3DBottomEntry

eventsFunctions.description: Check if an Object is in Collision with an an Obstacles Top.
eventsFunctions.name: CollisonWithObstacleTop
eventsFunctions.sentence: _PARAM0_ Is in Collison with the Top of _PARAM3_

eventsFunctions.description: Check if an Object is in Collision with an an Obstacles Bottom.
eventsFunctions.name: CollisonWithObstacleBottom
eventsFunctions.sentence: _PARAM0_ Is in Collison with the Bottom of _PARAM3_

propertyDescriptors.label: Pickup Range of a obstacle
propertyDescriptors.description: Higher  the value. the higher it will pick you up from the ground, a good value should  be  about double your falling height.
propertyDescriptors.name: PickupRange

propertyDescriptors.label: Acceleration of falling speed
propertyDescriptors.description: If it is higher  than falling speed, it will gain speed. if its lower, It will lose speed. As you fall.
propertyDescriptors.name: FallingSpeedAcceleration

propertyDescriptors.label: Tween Behavior
propertyDescriptors.description: Some Functions will not work properly without
propertyDescriptors.name: Tween

propertyDescriptors.label: The Gravity scale of the object
propertyDescriptors.description: Gravity scale is a modification that multiplys the jump height, and makes falling slower.
propertyDescriptors.name: Gravity_scale
